entry: International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies (IFRCS)
description: note - formerly known as League of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies (LORCS) 5 May 1919 to organize, coordinate, and direct international relief actions; to promote humanitarian activities; to represent and encourage the development of National Societies; to bring help to victims of armed conflicts, refugees, and displaced people; to reduce the vulnerability of people through development programs members - (190 plus the Palestine Liberation Organization) Afghanistan, Albania, Algeria, Andorra, Angola, Antigua and Barbuda, Argentina, Armenia, Australia, Austria, Azerbaijan,
